author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1332 Add support for multi-value sling:alias properties for resource resolution. Mapping a resource will always use the first value of a multi-value sling:alias property.

author: stack
msg: I'd added a bunch of tests here for functionality i later ripped out.
Let out IE until we decide what we want to do with these (We're letting out
This is the test I'm currently working on. Its good for state across
restarts.  Added in more logging and assertions.
Make master wait for ever as default.
Javadoc and moved minor duplicated code.
More strict about adhering to passed timeout.
I'd added new blockUntilChanged methods but thinking on it, they were a
mistake.  Notion was wait until the data up in zk had changed -- say
root region had moved -- but trouble is that we may assign root back to
same host... and so data would be the same (not checking zk revision
-- perhaps we should be).  This is probably an open issue given how
assignment as currently done looks wrong (We always assign root and
Bug fix; need to zero out root location in zk before we assign.
